title: Alacritty is likely sending repeat events for Enter, Tab, and Backspace
body:
### System

OS: Linux (gentoo)
Version: alacritty 0.14.0
Linux/BSD: GNOME Wayland

### Logs

Crashes: NONE

Font/Terminal size:
```
>> alacritty -vv
Created log file at "/tmp/Alacritty-90736.log"
[0.000004981s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Welcome to Alacritty
[0.000046713s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Version 0.14.0
[0.000052931s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Running on X11
[0.000308695s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Configuration files loade
                                     "/home/bdas/.config/ala
[0.012889230s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Using GLX 1.4
[0.020940400s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Picked GL Config:
                                     buffer_type: Some(Rgb {
                                     alpha_size: 8
                                     num_samples: 0
                                     hardware_accelerated: t
                                     supports_transparency:
                                     config_api: Api(OPENGL
                                     srgb_capable: false
[0.022652703s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Window scale factor: 1
[0.032052349s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Loading "Source Code Pro"
[0.039537250s] [DEBUG] [crossfont] Loaded Face Face { ft_fac
[0.044446355s] [DEBUG] [crossfont] Loaded Face Face { ft_fac
[0.048278692s] [DEBUG] [crossfont] Loaded Face Face { ft_fac
[0.052028304s] [DEBUG] [crossfont] Loaded Face Face { ft_fac
[0.053652446s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Running on llvmpipe (LLVM
[0.053659559s] [INFO ] [alacritty] OpenGL version 4.5 (Core
[0.053662232s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Using OpenGL 3.3 renderer
[0.061422875s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Enabled debug logging for
[0.061440245s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Filling glyph cache with
[0.063433850s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Cell size: 10 x 23
[0.063442410s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Padding: 0 x 0
[0.063446090s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Width: 800, Height: 600
[0.064444006s] [INFO ] [alacritty] PTY dimensions: 26 x 80
[0.067551722s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Initialisation complete
```

Keyboard and bindings:
```
[41.392361260s] [INFO ] [alacritty_winit_event] About to wait
[41.470384238s] [INFO ] [alacritty_winit_event] About to wait
[41.473453397s] [INFO ] [alacritty_winit_event] KeyboardInput { device_id: DeviceId(X(DeviceId(3))), event: KeyEvent { physical_key: Code(Enter), logical_key: Named(Enter), text: Some("\r"), location: Standard, state: Released, repeat: false, platform_specific: KeyEventExtra { text_with_all_modifiers: Some("\r"), key_without_modifiers: Named(Enter) } }, is_synthetic: false }
[41.473511763s] [INFO ] [alacritty_winit_event] About to wait
[43.785675712s] [INFO ] [alacritty_winit_event] CursorMoved { device_id: DeviceId(X(DeviceId(2))), position: PhysicalPosition { x: 352.0, y: 561.0 } }
[43.785761442s] [INFO ] [alacritty_winit_event] AxisMotion { device_id: DeviceId(X(DeviceId(2))), axis: 0, value: 927.0 }
[43.785776078s] [INFO ] [alacritty_winit_event] AxisMotion { device_id: DeviceId(X(DeviceId(2))), axis: 1, value: 710.0 }
[43.785829918s] [INFO ] [alacritty_winit_event] About to wait
```

[While using neovim (from master) I noticed that keys such ash Tab and backspace are being repeated.](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/issues/31806) I reported on neovim, but was asked to inform this to Alacritty developers and was guided to this https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/keyboard-protocol/#report-event-types. Can you please help.
